name: Befabled | A Visual Novel Deckbuilder
description:
Befabled delivers a single player experience that combines the tactical appeal of building your own deck with a puzzle-like linking system that governs how you play your cards, ensuring each battle is unique and exciting. Which cards will you recruit, and which cards will you play?

Main Features:

  • Lose yourself in the story of the Fabled Ones, featuring a fantasy setting and a colorful cast of characters based on fairy tales
  • 6 missions with seamless transitions from story sequences to battle sequences
  • Expressive artwork and fully voiced battles bring the characters to life
  • Listen to classic fantasy style BGM character themes
  • Chain one action after another by linking the colors of their cards and deliver a devastating blow to your opponent
  • It's free!

Minimum System Requirements

  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: ~500 MB Available Space
  • Video Card: NVIDIA® Geforce 660 (Integrated Video Cards not recommended)
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9
  • Additional: 3-button mouse

Check out what game dev is about here: https://www.thaumaturgegames.com/blog/

Character art by: Anneliese Mak
